content.raw: OK, I can definitely reproduce the issue when building from a Docker image \(for both kinetic and melodic\). Now I have the opposite problem--I don’t see the lag Brian is describing. On my machine, the patch appears to solve the problem.
content.html: OK, I can definitely reproduce the issue when building from a Docker image (for both kinetic and melodic). Now I have the opposite problem--I don’t see the lag Brian is describing. On my machine, the patch appears to solve the problem.
